name: Bucket Salad
author: JULIELAIN2
summary: This is a festive taco style salad that I have made at every family gathering, due to all the requests I get for it.  Serve it as a side, or as a meal.
ingredients: 2 heads iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
1 (14.5 ounce) package corn tortilla chips, broken
2 (12 ounce) jars creamy Ranch salad dressing
directions: As you tear and chop the lettuce, onion, and tomatoes, place them into a large container
I always use a clean bucket, hence the name, and it is full when the salad is completed
Crumble in the tortilla chips, and add the cheese
Stir in the two jars of Ranch dressing, and the salsa
Brown the ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat, stirring and crumbling as it cooks
Stir the beef into the salad just before serving
